randhati：[radh，randh] ① 害悪を及ぼす，困らせる．caus．randheti 苦しめる，陥らしめる．imper．randhehi； aor．randhayi，randhayuṃ．② 料理す．opt．randheyya； pp．randha ②．

Randhati，[radh or randh，differentiated in Pāli to 2 meanings & 2 verbs according to Dhtm：“hiṁsāyaṁ” （148），and “pāke” （827）．In the former sense given as raṇḍ，in the latter randh．The root is freq．in the Vedas，in meaning 1．It belongs perhaps to Ags．rendan to rend：see Walde，Lat．Wtb．s，v．lumbus] to be or make subject to，（intrs．） to be in one’s power； （trs．） to harass，oppress，vex，hurt （mostly Caus．randheti=Sk．randhayati）．Only in Imper．randhehi J．I，332，and in Prohib．mā randhayi J．V，121，and pl．mā randhayuṁ Dh．248 （=mā randhantu mā mathantu DhA．III，357）．See also randha2．-- 2．to cook （cp．Sk．randhi & randhana） Miln．107 （bhojanaṁ randheyya）．-- pp．randha1．（Page 565）

randhati：ရန္ဓတိ （√ရန္ဓ်）
